channel.title: Why do people post a poll when it isnt one..?
channel.description: well to post a thread dont go to the pole thing just go to [glow=green,2,300]new topic[/glow]well hope this helps :) ;) :D :cool: :P ;D

item.title: Why do people post a poll when it isnt one..?
item.dc:creator: @Pk3r_Dale Pk3r Dale
item.description:
@Pk3r_Dale wrote:

:)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 12:50:39 AM[/size][hr]well its annoying seeing all the poll symbols[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 12:52:01 AM[/size][hr]post what ya think :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 03:49:20 AM[/size][hr]hmm this has been up da top for a while lol[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 05:05:14 AM[/size][hr]plz read this! coz its annoying when theres polls and it isnt really one[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 06:16:11 PM[/size][hr]letting u know![br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 05:15:25 AM[/size][hr][size=15pt]hmm is this how u change font size =[/size]
